recipe.title: How to Make Scones
recipe.intro: Scones are a popular treat in Australia. You can eat them with jam and cream at a cafÃ©.
recipe.ingredients: self-raising flour, butter, sugar, milk, egg, salt, jam, whipped cream
steps: **Mix** the flour, sugar, and salt in a big bowl.
**Cut** the cold butter into small pieces and **rub** it into the flour with your fingers.
**Add** the milk and egg, and **stir** until the dough comes together.
**Roll** the dough on a floured surface and **cut** circles with a cup.
**Bake** for 12 to 15 minutes until golden brown. **Serve** with jam and cream!

review.text: I went to Palm Cove Bakery on Sunday morning. It is a lovely cafÃ© near the beach. I ordered a pot of English Breakfast tea and a scone with jam and cream. The scone was warm and fluffy. The jam was homemade strawberry jam. I sat on the terrace and looked at the ocean. The weather was perfect. This is my favourite cafÃ© in Cairns area!

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"I ordered a pot of English Breakfast tea and a scone."

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Good morning! Welcome to our cafÃ©. How can I help you?

lines.speaker: Lily
lines.text: Hi! What kind of scones do you have today?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Today we have plain scones and pumpkin scones.

lines.speaker: Lily
lines.text: Oh, I will try the plain scone, please. Does it come with jam?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Yes, it comes with strawberry jam and whipped cream.

lines.speaker: Lily
lines.text: Perfect! And can I also have a cup of Earl Grey tea?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Of course! Would you like milk with your tea?

lines.speaker: Lily
lines.text: Yes, please. With a little milk.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Great! That will be twelve dollars fifty.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Thanks! Your order will be ready in a few minutes. Enjoy!

quiz3.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Yes, please. With a little milk."

part_a.full_text: Hey, do you want to make scones together? Sure, that sounds fun! Do we have enough flour? Let me check. Yes, we have plenty of flour. Great. What about butter? We need cold butter from the fridge. OK, I will get it. Can you preheat the oven to 220 degrees? No problem. I love the smell of fresh scones!

gaps.before: We need cold butter from the

part_b.full_text: Welcome to Coral Sea CafÃ©. Today we have a special afternoon tea set. The set includes two scones, a slice of cake, and a pot of tea. You can choose from three kinds of tea: English Breakfast, Earl Grey, or green tea. The scones are baked fresh every morning. We also have gluten-free scones if you need them. The afternoon tea set is twenty-five dollars per person. It is available from two o'clock to five o'clock. Would you like to book a table?

try_it.example: Today, a lady came to the cafÃ© and ordered a scone with Earl Grey tea. I said 'Would you like milk with your tea?' She said 'Yes, please!' I was happy because she smiled.
